episodes.title: Inside Silicon Valley's Worst Gang Stalking Cult
episodes.description:
I'm Dantavius and this is: Inside Silicon Valley's Worst Gang Stalking Cult. Also known as The eBay Stalking Scandal. A Conspiracy among top executives at eBay who participated in a harassment campaign against David and Ina Steiner because they wrote some articles that they didn't like. 

Time Stamps 

0:00 - Intro 
1:39 - Who are the Steiners? 
2:44 - When did this all begin? 
8:28 - A Conspiracy is Born 
11:10 - The 2nd Target 
12:25 - The Beginning of the End
13:40 - The White Knight Strategy 
18:43 - The Honeypot 
20:12 - Plan B 
21:27 - Things Fell Apart
23:57 - JUSTICE
